results.title: Quickstart - Create a Linux VM in the Azure portal - Azure Virtual Machines
results.description: This quickstart shows you how to use the Azure... To see your VM in action, you also SSH to the VM and install the NGINX web server. Install web server To see your VM in action, install the NGINX web server. From your SSH session, update your package sources and then install the latest NGINX package. Ubuntu SUSE Linux (SLES) Red Hat Enterprise.

results.title: Push & Pull Container Image using Azure Container Registry - Azure Container Registry
results.description: Pull a public Nginx image First, pull a public Nginx image to your local computer. Push the image to your registry Now that you've tagged the image with the fully qualified path to your private registry, you can push it to the registry with docker push: Pull the image from your registry Use the docker pull command to pull the image from your.
